com.jr.comment

Interface CommentProvider


  • public interface CommentProvider
    Interface for comment provider.
    Author:
    Julian Ragan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addComment(CommentContainer cc)
      Should take container and properly save comment in the context of application and storage medium
      boolean addPermission()
      this method should return permission status independedly of any comments, since it will be called only once, at initialization stage.
      boolean deletePermission()

      Should be used to expose first and following comments contents to the getters
      boolean nextTag()
      Should be used to expose first and following tags of current comment to the getters

    • Method Detail

      • next

        boolean next()
        Should be used to expose first and following comments contents to the getters
        Returns:
        true, if next comment was exposed, false if there are no new commets

      • editPermission

        boolean editPermission()
        Returns:
        true, if current user has permission to edit current comment in the context of the application

      • deletePermission

        boolean deletePermission()
        Returns:
        true, if current user has permission to delete current comment in the context of the application

      • addPermission

        boolean addPermission()
        this method should return permission status independedly of any comments, since it will be called only once, at initialization stage.
        Returns:
        true, if user has permission to add comments to current application context.

      • addComment

        int addComment(CommentContainer cc)
        Should take container and properly save comment in the context of application and storage medium
        Parameters:
        cc - contains data of the new comment, new comment id is -1 in container and shuold not be used for saving
        Returns:
        comment id number, which was assigned by the storage management system

      • updateComment

        void updateComment(CommentContainer cc)
        Should take container and properly upadet earlier comment content in the context of application and storage medium
        Parameters:
        cc - comment container

      • removeComment

        void removeComment(CommentContainer cc)
        Should take container and properly remove earlier comment content in the context of application and storage medium
        Parameters:
        cc - comment container

      • getPlainTextContent

        java.lang.String getPlainTextContent()
        Returns:
        plain text content

      • getAuthor

        java.lang.String getAuthor()
        Returns:
        authors full name

      • getHtmlContent

        java.lang.String getHtmlContent()
        Returns:
        HTML Content of the comment

      • getLastEditAuthor

        java.lang.String getLastEditAuthor()
        Returns:
        last edit auhtors full name or null if comment has not been edited

      • getTimestamp

        java.util.Date getTimestamp()
        Returns:
        java.util.Date with date of publication of the comment

      • getLastEditTimestamp

        java.util.Date getLastEditTimestamp()
        Returns:
        java.util.Date with date of last edit of the comment

      • getCommentId

        int getCommentId()
        Returns:
        internal id of the comment

      • getReferencedId

        int getReferencedId()
        Returns:
        internal number of a comment to which this one refers, or 0

      • getAuthorId

        int getAuthorId()
        Returns:
        internal author id number

      • getLastEditAuthorId

        int getLastEditAuthorId()
        Returns:
        internal author number id of last edit, or 0

      • getRefStart

        int getRefStart()
        Returns:
        0-based index of citation start, or -1 if no citation used

      • getRefStop

        int getRefStop()
        Returns:
        0-based index of citation stop, or -1 if no citation used

      • nextTag

        boolean nextTag()
        Should be used to expose first and following tags of current comment to the getters
        Returns:
        true, if next tag was exposed, false, if there are no more new tags to read

      • getTagValue

        java.lang.String getTagValue()
        Returns:
        tag value

      • getTagId

        int getTagId()
        Returns:
        tag id
